thread.title: Microsoft Releases New Cumulative Update for Windows 10
thread.title_full: Microsoft Releases New Cumulative Update for Windows 10 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft Releases New Cumulative Update for Windows 10
text: Microsoft has just released a new cumulative update for Windows 10, but once again, there is no change log offered with this patch. In other words, it’s pretty impossible for now to tell exactly what is new in KB3081455, so we might have to wait a little bit longer until more users install it and search for changes. Right now, there’s not even a KB page, but this should be up sometime in the next few hours. And yet, do not expect too many details, aside from the usual “t... »
